desc: A list of 7 OSS projects and the reasons behind these projects.  This article is to fit longer text into a caption in github.
title: OSS projects

desc: A convenience group indexing early articles on testing. Intro and linking articles for TDD, BDD, test tables, boundary, regression, mutation and unit test notes.
title: Testing Epic

desc: Following my talk on low level testing at PHPhants, requirements and a list of
title: Low-level Unit tests

desc: Yes, the DB is essential, and its also frail. Keep it running... I focus in this article on DB stability, DB performance, DB scalability and complicated queries.
title: Testing DB

desc: An UI and UX test library to be run in the browser, to assist usability and branding tests.  As a library to simplify your tests, and increase developer performance, this can be linked into Vitest, Playwright, Jasmine, Mocha, or Jest.
title: UX verify notes

desc: As LLMs are evolved rather than written, their testing is a different process to other software.  However, various reported and unexpected features show that testing is necessary.  The articles includes a LLM test plan and context information.
title: LLM testing

desc: Research into what JS tools and unit-test suites are available in order to write unit tests.
title: JS unit-test frameworks

desc: This article gives a definition of JS behaviour testing, provides metrics used for comparing test frameworks and finally outlines pros and cons of 7 behaviour test tools for JS
title: JS behaviour testing

desc: Project notes for forked project phpunit-skelgen; This is a test tool to save time to deliver good test coverage.
title: phpunit-skelgen

desc: Case notes for my Perl unit test framework.
title: punit: Creating test automatically

desc: Article with information about current stress test tools, from 2018 onward.   I examine the requirements for the tools and provide an exhaustive list of those tools.
title: REST test tools

desc: A unit-test for testing Symfony routes with; filed in test tools'. Practical examples of route testers are included.
title: Route tester for Symfony

desc: Research on Storybook: another frontend test tool that supports UX, UI, and component testing. Article describes 9 user cases and a list of 4 limitations
title: Exploring Storybook JS

desc: A review of another JS test framework, called Vitest.  This article outlines a list of useful features and a few issues to know about.
title: Vitest

desc: Definition of Accessibility Testing, guidelines including legal requirements, and a list of 10 software tools to perform accessibility test.
title: Accessibility Testing

desc: Review of options for user tracking and product analytics, to improve visibility of user actions and journeys on your app/ site.  Use one of these tools with UX analysis for best benefit to delivering a profitable service.
title: User tracking tools

desc: Test plan for timezones (and when they change), focused on JS and REST API. A look at test tools and process.
title: Timezone testing
